articles.author: Rosa Flores, Jacqueline Rose and Alexa Miranda, CNN
articles.title: 'I'm terrified I might be here forever': Brittney Griner pens handwritten letter to Biden - CNN
articles.description: WNBA star Brittney Griner, in a handwritten letter to President Joe Biden, said she fears she will be detained in Russia indefinitely and pleaded with the President not to forget about her and other American detainees.

articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Shireen Abu Aqleh: Israeli gunfire probably killed journalist, say US investigators - The Guardian
articles.description: But forensic analysis of bullet that killed Palestinian-American journalist found to be inconclusive
articles.content:
US investigators believe Israeli army gunfire probably killed the Palestinian-American journalist Shireen Abu Aqleh, although a forensic analysis of the bullet was inconclusive.
A statement released… [+2868 chars]

articles.title: US says Israeli military gunfire ​'likely responsible​' for Shireen Abu Akleh's death but examination of bullet inconclusive - CNN
